data.title: Castle & hotel Castillo de Curiel in Ribera del Duero
data.meta_description: The Hotel Castillo de Curiel in Ribera del Duero is one of the most spectacular hotels in wine country. Accommodation in a spectacular castle hotel with breathtakings views over the Ribera del Duero landscape.. The enchanting hotel Castillo del Collado is located in the oldest castle of the province of Valladolid, and is a really special place to stay. A truly unforgettable experience
data.text:
Hotel Castillo de Curiel in Ribera del Duero is a small, fantastic hotel, located in the oldest castle in Valladolid and has all the comforts of a modern hotel. Just 4 kilometers away from Pe単afiel, in the heart of Ribera del Duero, it is the perfect place for your wine trip. You will also learn about who lived in the castle in the Middle Ages, as each guest room is personalised to a historical figure, and enjoy the fantastic views.

Hotel Castillo de Curiel is located just 4 kilometers away from Pe単afiel, in the heart of Ribera del Duero. This location makes it a perfect place for your wine trip.

Accommodation in a spectacular castle hotel with breathtaking views over the Ribera del Duero landscape. The enchanting hotel Castillo de Curiel is located in the oldest castle of the province of Valladolid and is a really special place to stay. A truly unforgettable experience.

Sleeping in a real castle, an unforgettable experience

The spectacular views from the Castle, with the Castle of Pe単afiel in the distance

Pe単afiel is a good place to enjoy local Castilian gastronomy and some of its famous dishes like roasted lamb

The hotel is well located to enjoy visits to local wineries
